apple_vendor_description: A raised fist, rendered in a light skin tone, stands strong and defiant on Apple devices, its form sculpted with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and sharp, yet softly rounded, edges. The realistic lighting highlights its solid structure, conveying a powerful message of support, protest, or determination. This emoji, emblematic of Apple‚Äôs commitment to inclusive representation, is frequently used to show solidarity and strength in digital conversations.
